entry.value: # sample names into variables%%00010limma_names <- trimws(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["limma_design"]],',')[[1]])%%00010limma_names <- levels(as.factor(limma_names))%%00010limma_names <- limma_names[order(limma_names)]%%00010%%00010thresholds_names <- trimws(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["thresholds_samples"]],',')[[1]])%%00010thresholds_names <- levels(as.factor(thresholds_names))%%00010thresholds_names <- thresholds_names[order(thresholds_names)]%%00010%%00010# do sample names match%%00010match_sum <- sum(thresholds_names == limma_names)%%00010%%00010if (length(limma_names) != length(thresholds_names)){%%00010%%00009stop("Number of samples in threshold settings differs from LIMMA design")%%00010} else if (match_sum != length(limma_names)) {%%00010%%00009stop("Sample names in threshold settings don't match LIMMA design")%%00010}%%00010%%00010# are thresholds integers%%00010thresholds_values <- trimws(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["thresholds_values"]],',')[[1]])%%00010%%00010for (x in thresholds_values){%%00010%%00009x_num <- as.numeric(x)%%00010%%00009x_int <- as.integer(x_num)%%00010%%00010%%00009if (is.na(x_num) == TRUE){%%00010 %%00009%%00009stop("Threshold is not an allowed value")%%00010%%00009} %%00010%%00010%%00009if (x_num < 0){%%00010%%00009%%00009stop("Threshold can't be a negative number")%%00009%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009if (x_int != x_num){%%00010 %%00009%%00009stop("Threshold is not a whole number")%%00010%%00009}%%00010}%%00010%%00010knime.out <- knime.in

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
